**兽人斗篷**（orcish cloak）是[NetHack](/index.php?title=NetHack/zh-CN\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "NetHack/zh-CN (page does not exist)")中的一种[斗篷](/wiki/%E6%96%97%E7%AF%B7 "斗篷")类[防具](/wiki/%E9%98%B2%E5%85%B7 "防具")。它由[布](/index.php?title=%E5%B8%83\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "布 (page does not exist)")制成，未[鉴定](/index.php?title=%E9%89%B4%E5%AE%9A\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "鉴定 (page does not exist)")时外观为**粗糙的小斗篷**（coarse mantelet）。

[ ]

## Contents

- [1 生成](#.E7.94.9F.E6.88.90)

- [2 描述](#.E6.8F.8F.E8.BF.B0)

- [3 策略](#.E7.AD.96.E7.95.A5)

- [4 历史](#.E5.8E.86.E5.8F.B2)

- [5 Variants](#Variants)

  - [5.1 SLASH'EM](#SLASH.27EM)
  - [5.2 UnNetHack](#UnNetHack)
  - [5.3 dNetHack](#dNetHack)
  - [5.4 EvilHack](#EvilHack)

- [6 引用及注释](#.E5.BC.95.E7.94.A8.E5.8F.8A.E6.B3.A8.E9.87.8A)

## 生成

[强兽人](/index.php?title=%E5%BC%BA%E5%85%BD%E4%BA%BA\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "强兽人 (page does not exist)")在生成时有1⁄3的概率[携带](/index.php?title=%E6%80%AA%E7%89%A9%E8%B5%B7%E5%A7%8B%E7%89%A9%E5%93%81\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "怪物起始物品 (page does not exist)")一件兽人斗篷[\[1\]](#cite_note-1)。[兽人队长](/index.php?title=%E5%85%BD%E4%BA%BA%E9%98%9F%E9%95%BF\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "兽人队长 (page does not exist)")生成时有1⁄2的概率获得强兽人的防具，因此有1⁄6的概率获得一件兽人斗篷[\[2\]](#cite_note-2)。

## 描述

兽人斗篷的基础[AC](/index.php?title=AC/zh-CN\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "AC/zh-CN (page does not exist)")加成为0，且提供[MC](/index.php?title=MC/zh-CN\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "MC/zh-CN (page does not exist)")1。

## 策略

除了[矮人斗篷](/wiki/%E7%9F%AE%E4%BA%BA%E6%96%97%E7%AF%B7 "矮人斗篷")以外，绝大多数斗篷都比兽人斗篷要好，但至少你可以用兽人斗篷来防止你的铠甲被[侵蚀](/index.php?title=%E4%BE%B5%E8%9A%80\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "侵蚀 (page does not exist)")。如果你需要阅读未鉴定的[卷轴](/index.php?title=%E5%8D%B7%E8%BD%B4\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "卷轴 (page does not exist)")，兽人斗篷也适合用作[防具毁坏卷轴](/index.php?title=%E9%98%B2%E5%85%B7%E6%AF%81%E5%9D%8F%E5%8D%B7%E8%BD%B4\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "防具毁坏卷轴 (page does not exist)")的牺牲品。

## 历史

兽人斗篷最初于[NetHack 3.0.0](/wiki/NetHack_3.0.0 "NetHack 3.0.0")加入游戏。直到[NetHack 3.4.3](/wiki/NetHack_3.4.3 "NetHack 3.4.3")为止，兽人斗篷能提供[MC](/index.php?title=%E9%94%80%E9%AD%94%EF%BC%883.4.3%EF%BC%89\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "销魔（3.4.3） (page does not exist)")2。

## Variants

**此条目或段落的部分内容需要翻译。**  
您可以帮助我们[**翻译此页面**](https://nethackwiki.com/index.php?title=Orcish_cloak/zh-CN\&action=edit)，但**请勿使用机器翻译**。

Variants based on NetHack 3.4.3 may retain the orcish cloak's MC2 when worn.

Some variants may give orcs (including the player) an AC bonus for wearing orcish cloaks.

### SLASH'EM

In [SLASH'EM](/wiki/SLASH%27EM "SLASH'EM"), the orcish cloak grants MC2 when worn as in NetHack 3.4.3. An orcish cloak can be [upgraded](/wiki/Upgraded "Upgraded") into either an [oilskin cloak](/wiki/Oilskin_cloak "Oilskin cloak") or an [elven cloak](/wiki/Elven_cloak "Elven cloak"), with an equal chance for each item.

### UnNetHack

In [UnNetHack](/wiki/UnNetHack "UnNetHack"), orcish cloaks grant +1 AC to orcish monsters that wear them, including player [orcs](/wiki/Orc_\(starting_race\) "Orc (starting race)").

### dNetHack

In [dNetHack](/wiki/DNetHack "DNetHack"), an orcish cloak grants 0 AC, 0 [DR](/wiki/DR "DR") and MC2 when worn.

[The Mantle of Wrath](/wiki/The_Mantle_of_Wrath "The Mantle of Wrath") is an [artifact](/wiki/Artifact "Artifact") orcish cloak that can be safely enchanted to +7. While carried, it grants [fire resistance](/wiki/Fire_resistance "Fire resistance") and [aggravate monster](/wiki/Aggravate_monster "Aggravate monster"); while worn, it also confers [acid resistance](/wiki/Acid_resistance "Acid resistance") and [half spell damage](/wiki/Half_spell_damage "Half spell damage"), and blocks all sources of aggravate monster.

### EvilHack

In [EvilHack](/wiki/EvilHack "EvilHack"), orcish cloaks grant +1 AC to orcish monsters that wear them, including player orcs.

[Goblin outriders](/wiki/Goblin_outrider "Goblin outrider"), [goblin-captains](/wiki/Goblin-captain "Goblin-captain") and various [orcish](/wiki/Racial_monster "Racial monster") [mercenaries](/wiki/Mercenaries "Mercenaries") have a 1⁄3 chance of generating with an orcish cloak.

## 引用及注释

2. [↑](#cite_ref-2) [src/makemon.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 402](https://github.com/NetHack/NetHack/blob/NetHack-3.6.7_Released/src/makemon.c#L402)

兽人斗篷（orcish cloak）是NetHack中的一种斗篷类防具。它由布制成，未鉴定时外观为粗糙的小斗篷（coarse mantelet）。

    • 5.4 EvilHack

生成

强兽人在生成时有1⁄3的概率携带一件兽人斗篷[1]。兽人队长生成时有1⁄2的概率获得强兽人的防具，因此有1⁄6的概率获得一件兽人斗篷[2]。

描述

兽人斗篷的基础AC加成为0，且提供MC1。

策略

除了矮人斗篷以外，绝大多数斗篷都比兽人斗篷要好，但至少你可以用兽人斗篷来防止你的铠甲被侵蚀。如果你需要阅读未鉴定的卷轴，兽人斗篷也适合用作防具毁坏卷轴的牺牲品。

历史

兽人斗篷最初于NetHack 3.0.0加入游戏。直到NetHack 3.4.3为止，兽人斗篷能提供MC2。

Variants

Variants based on NetHack 3.4.3 may retain the orcish cloak's MC2 when worn.

Some variants may give orcs (including the player) an AC bonus for wearing orcish cloaks.

SLASH'EM

In SLASH'EM, the orcish cloak grants MC2 when worn as in NetHack 3.4.3. An orcish cloak can be upgraded into either an oilskin cloak or an elven cloak, with an equal chance for each item.

UnNetHack

In UnNetHack, orcish cloaks grant +1 AC to orcish monsters that wear them, including player orcs.

dNetHack

In dNetHack, an orcish cloak grants 0 AC, 0 DR and MC2 when worn.

The Mantle of Wrath is an artifact orcish cloak that can be safely enchanted to +7. While carried, it grants fire resistance and aggravate monster; while worn, it also confers acid resistance and half spell damage, and blocks all sources of aggravate monster.

EvilHack

In EvilHack, orcish cloaks grant +1 AC to orcish monsters that wear them, including player orcs.

Goblin outriders, goblin-captains and various orcish mercenaries have a 1⁄3 chance of generating with an orcish cloak.
